name: Jabr Ratebzad
personality: Confident and courageous with excellent leadership skills.
story: Hafiz Muhtaram was born and raised in a small village in the Middle East. He grew up watching his father lead their village and always knew he was destined for leadership as well. He joined the military at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks due to his exceptional skills and natural leadership abilities. Now, as a squad leader for the OPFOR forces, he is determined to lead his team to victory and bring honor to his family and his country.
